summary: This document is an email chain from August 2021 between Jordy Feldman, the Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program (EVCP), and FBI/ NYPD personnel. The chain discusses Feldman's attempts to connect with law enforcement regarding the program and a specific incident where a disgruntled claimant sent threatening communications.

persons.name: Jordy Feldman
persons.role: Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program
persons.context: The primary sender/recipient in the email chain; seeks to coordinate with law enforcement regarding the compensation program and reports threatening communications from a claimant.

persons.name: Elena Vournas
persons.context: Copied on all emails in the chain, appears to be a colleague or staff member associated with Jordy Feldman and the compensation program.

persons.name: Amanda Nicole
persons.context: An FBI Special Agent with the New York Field Office, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking squad, who corresponds with Jordy Feldman about the compensation program and the threatening claimant.

connections.description: Feldman, as the EVCP Administrator, is seeking information and coordination from Special Agent Amanda Nicole regarding the Epstein investigation and a specific threatening claimant.
Vournas is consistently copied on Feldman's emails, indicating a close working relationship within the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program.

events.title: Threatening Email from Claimant Reported
events.description: Jordy Feldman reports receiving a threatening email from a disgruntled claimant to the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program, which he describes as threatening bodily harm.

events.title: FBI Supervisor Contact Initiated
events.description: An email indicates that an FBI supervisor of the violent crime squad was contacted and that someone from that squad would call Jordy Feldman within a day.

events.title: Scheduled Call Between Feldman and FBI
events.description: Jordy Feldman and FBI Special Agent Amanda Nicole schedule a call to discuss the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program.

keyFacts: Jordy Feldman was the Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program (EVCP), an independent, litigation-alternative program to resolve victims' claims.
Feldman received threatening communications in 2021 from a disgruntled claimant to the program, which he reported to the FBI.
The email chain shows ongoing coordination attempts between the EVCP administrator and FBI/NYPD personnel specializing in child exploitation and human trafficking.
The document references an 'ongoing investigation' into Jeffrey Epstein, with law enforcement subject to restrictions on what they can discuss.
